channel.title: ::bomb command
channel.description:
i see people on some server when they type ::bomb loads of stuff goes everywere well im adding skillcapes so i added this [code] staticAnimation(445, absX, absY, 100); staticAnimation(524, absX, absY, 100); staticAnimation(479, absX, absY, 100);[/code]
but i get these errors
[code]client.java:36: cannot find symbol symbol : method staticAnimation(int,int,int,int) location: class client staticAnimation(445, absX, absY, 100); ^ client.java:37: cannot find symbol symbol : method staticAnimation(int,int,int,int) location: class client staticAnimation(524, absX, absY, 100); ^ client.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : method staticAnimation(int,int,int,int) location: class client staticAnimation(479, absX, absY, 100); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
[/code] why!?
seomeone help me please

item.title: ::bomb command
item.dc:creator: @Peter787 Peter787
item.description:
@Peter787 wrote:

woops

stillGfx(445, absX, absY, 100); stillGfx(524, absX, absY, 100); stillGfx(479, absX, absY, 100);[br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2007, 06:34:54 AM[/size][hr]YOu have working skill capes, what did you need though, why did u you need a gfx for a skill cape?

item.title: ::bomb command
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

nvm i did it
now i got working capes…
i added this
pEmote = 439;
stillgfx(78, absY, absX);
